title: Cant apply for PBE
body:
When i try to go to sing up on this page https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe it says "Error 500 Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem.

replies.body: This is an issue we've been looking into, where some players are getting a 500 error.  Are you able to use a VPN to access the page?  This has served as a workaround in the meantime, and hope it might help!
Didn't work i don't know if i'm doing it right or wrong but i was following a tutorial on YouTube aswell

Thanks for trying!  Hit us p in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you.  I can't make any guarantees until this is resolved, but your ticket can help us investigate further.  We'll get back to you!
